keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight the Tory Retirement Age Increase
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose the Tories' plan to raise retirement age and create a dementia tax.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Delivering a Brexit That Works For Us
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a managed Brexit that respects the referendum result but doesn't damage our manufacturing industries.
Stand up against Tory cuts to our NHS and school budgets, and never support Tory plans to sell off our public services to the highest bidder.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: To Continue to Be an Accessible MP
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Hold hundreds of coffee mornings, surgeries, and public meetings to offer help and support at all times.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: To Fight for the Jobs & Investment We Need
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Need high skilled & well paid jobs. Led campaign to bring Channel 4 here. Move to stop trying to bring new investment into the Potteries.

issues.brexitEurope: Fight for a managed Brexit that respects the referendum result but doesn't damage our manufacturing industries.
issues.economy: Need high skilled & well paid jobs. Move to stop trying to bring new investment into the Potteries.
issues.education: Stand up against Tory cuts to our school budgets.
issues.health: Stand up against Tory cuts to our NHS.

images.caption: Photo of Gareth Snell next to Labour party branding.
